name: Duffle Coats UK
tag_list: duffle-coats, duffle-coat, duffle, duffels, mens-duffle-coats, womens-duffle-coats, ladies-duffle-coats, montgomery, sale, uk
description: Duffle Coats UK sell original dufflecoat
overview:
Duffle Coats UK sell an authentic original Montgomery duffle coat, which is handmade in England using the finest materials. It is a British classic that remains at the forefront of fashion across the globe.

The Duffle coats offer a classic design combined with superior quality materials and workmanship, manufactured at the original and world’s oldest duffle coat manufacturer.

All Montgomery duffle coats are handmade in the UK. Our Duffles are stylish, warm, windproof and robust. These winter coats are stylish and comfortable authentic montgomery duffel coats. Take a look at the video, which showcases the quality of our duffle coats, and if you are interested to know about the history of duffles make sure you have a good read through the short history presentation.
